task_background: Prepare the digital media startup office for an important investor meeting by organizing, cleaning, and repairing key items.

tasks.task_description: Place the CRT Monitor (crt_monitor_1) on the CEO Desk (ceo_desk_1).
Place the Draft Article on Editorâ€™s Screen (draft_article_1) on the Corkboard (corkboard_1).
Find the heaviest, black item on the Server Rack (server_rack_1) and place it on the Long Desk (long_desk_1).
Find the only item with a red color in the Server Closet (server_closet) and place it on the Bulletin Board (bulletin_board_1).
Use the Cleaning Rag (cleaning_rag_1) to wipe the Sticky Keyboard (keyboard_1).
Use the Hammer (hammer_1) to damage the Dead Potted Plant (dead_plant_1).
Use the Polish Cloth (polish_cloth_1) to polish the CEO Desk (ceo_desk_1) and then place the Financial Reports (financial_reports_1) on it.
Use the Packing Tape (packing_tape_1) to pack the Stack of Unlabeled CDs (unlabeled_cds_1) and then place them in the Long Desk (long_desk_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to turn on the Oscillating Fan (oscillating_fan_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the Fridge (fridge_1).
Move the Server Rack (server_rack_1) to the Executive Office (executive_office).
Move the Long Scuffed Wooden Desk (long_desk_1) to the Break Room (break_room).
Cooperatively move the Inkjet Printer (inkjet_printer_1) that is jammed to the Server Closet (server_closet) and use the Hammer (hammer_1) to fix it.
Cooperatively move the Gray Cubicle (cubicle_1) to the Newsroom Hub (newsroom_hub) and use the Polish Cloth (polish_cloth_1) to polish it.
